title: icon missing
body:
I'm still waiting for april fools icon and idk if you're going to give me the gift zayah/rakan icon :| 
Do i'm going to get the icon? :| 
What do i do now?

replies.body: Xayah & Rakan icons will be granted within 2 weeks of the event concluding. The event concludes @ 11:59 PM PDT, April 26th.

You should have received it already, check to ensure you didn't miss it. If it's still not there;

Contact Riot’s [Player Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)

* The primary category has already been selected. 

* For the secondary category, choose **Game & Features.**

* Under the tertiary category, choose **General Questions.**

http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Blitzcrank_5.jpg
Thanks man i did it just right now

That's definitely odd if you don't have the April Fool's icon yet, promise we aren't pranking you with that still xD. Go ahead and hit us up in a #[**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get that sorted out for you!

As for the Gift of Magic Icon, they're still going out and should all be granted by around May 10th. If you still don't have it by then, hit us up with another ticket.

OK OK OK 
This isnt a funny prank and if its not i already hit you up with a ticket 
I always have trouble with icons... WHY YOU HATE ME RIOT I LOVE YOU
